channel.title: PI Dungeoneering
channel.description: When a player is in the Dungeon and they die they teleport them back to home. I need help when they die that the server knows that they have left The Dungeoneering Area. Dont know how but players are losing there items when they leave the area. Then they loose all the worn items they have. This is the current code for when they die. [code]if (Dungeoneering.Dung(c)) { c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); }[/code] Dont know what to do. I need it to recognize it left that area. Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: PI Dungeoneering
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“blddyboy, post:1, topic:450524”]When a player is in the Dungeon and they die they teleport them back to home.
I need help when they die that the server knows that they have left The Dungeoneering Area.
Dont know how but players are losing there items when they leave the area.
Then they loose all the worn items they have.
This is the current code for when they die.

if (Dungeoneering.Dung(c)) { c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); }
Dont know what to do.
I need it to recognize it left that area.
Any help would be appreciated.[/quote]

Add an exception or check to your real death methods.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Dungeoneering
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

When a player is in the Dungeon and they die they teleport them back to home.
I need help when they die that the server knows that they have left The Dungeoneering Area.
Dont know how but players are losing there items when they leave the area.
Then they loose all the worn items they have.
This is the current code for when they die.

if (Dungeoneering.Dung(c)) { c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); }
Dont know what to do.
I need it to recognize it left that area.
Any help would be appreciated.
